newsitem.title: ALGERIA: Moderate Islamist protests Algeria election result.
newsitem.headline: Moderate Islamist protests Algeria election result.

text.p: Algeria's moderate Islamist leader Mahfoud Nahnad said on Friday he would file legal protests against a general election defeat of his party but vowed to maintain his peaceful policy.
"The large margin between the National Democratic Rally (RND) and Movement of a Peaceful Society (MPS) does not reflect the real results," Nahnah told supporters at MPS headquarters.
"We will file protests to the Constitutional Council."
